name: ESR NGO FOUNDATION

address: Sai Sri Towers, Street no.4, Himayathnagar,

briefDescription: 1.To create spirit among the Rural People in development activates.2.To advice and help for the Rural People.3.To strive for social, educational, economical and cultural development in the community of rural poor.4.To promote Literacy and provide opportunities for self employment.5.To provide medical facilities and medical camps at needy areas.6.To take necessary measures for better transportation and formation of roads in rural areasAs on Today More than 500 People benefited under this organization.
